page.title: 04COMMUTING FROM MIDMAR
page.content: Because of the oil industry in the North of Scotland it is attracting oil businessmen and oil related business men to country villages like Midmar. There are all sorts of people connected with the oil like people on oil rigs, computer specialists and company directors who live in Midmar.There are lots of colleges and a university in Aberdeen so quite a few people in Midmar are also involved and employed by these colleges and commute to Aberdeen.The colleges are the Robert Gordon's Institute of Technology, the Technical College, The Rowett, the College of Education, Craibstone College and the Commercial College.
